bboxes.raw_text:
That the time Of the Com
meneement Of this Corporation
shall be the date these Articles
are filed In the office Of the Ari-
iona Corporation Commission Of
the State Of Arizona, and ter
mination thereof shall be twenty
five (25) years thereafter. with
the privilege Of renewal. as
provided by law.
ARTICLE w

A Housewives For Jake Hig-
gins committee has been formed
to aid the election of State Rep.
F. A. "Jake" Higgins to the
Arizona Corporation Commits
sion announced Mrs. Fred Wendell
of Phoenix.


Mrs. Herbert Angel, founder
and president of the Sun City Re-
publican Club, is honorary chair
man Of the group.


Other charter members of the
committee include Miss Juanita
Ames, Mesdames Edward Banks,
Robert Brewer, Gerry Eliot,
Robert Fisher, Charles Garland,
Ed Janney, Frank Kelley, Edwin
c. Lynch, Betty Rockwell, Lou
Silverstein, Randolph E. Soran-
son, Grace Webb and Stanley
Womer, all of Phoenix. Others
are Mesdames Augusta Larson,
Lakeside: Kenneth H. Benson,
Sedona; and Charles Reisher,
William F. Higgins and Eldon
H. Pickett, all of Tucson.

Higgins Booster
Group Formed

waived preliminary hearings be-
fore a US. commissioner
because their attorneys said
confession by the fourth would be
introduced as evidence.


The confession duplicates the
other three in the Staying of Penn,
a lieutenant colonel in the Army
reserve, as he and two Negro
reservists we're driving along
Georgia road July IL.
KIunsmen To Have Jury Hearing

FORT MADISON, Iowa The
city Chamber of Commerce can
celed the appearance of Quaker
Oats Aunt Jemima at a rodeo
here. Leonard H. Carter NAACP
regional secretary, said this was
another stereotype that needs to
go to sleep forever.
No Aunt Jemima

ATHENS. Ga. The Federal
Bureau of Investigation has
agreed to permit the state of
Georgia to try four Ku Klux
Klansmen on murder charges if
they are indicted by a grand jury
for the shotgun Staying of Wash
ington educator Lemuel Penn, a
Negro.


The grand jury will convene
Aug. "a. Three of the men

LOS ANGELES Cassius M.
Clay, u, worlds heavyweight
boxing champion, was married
recently to Sonj Roi, "a. Chi
cago model.


Clays mother said she didn't
know of the marriage.
Clay Weds Mode !

expulsion. and their rights.
powers and authority shall be
set out in the Bylaws Of the
Corporation, and only the
amended or changed as therein
provided.

OF
DEBONAIRS SOCIAL AND
ART CLUB


Know all Men BY These Presents:
That we, the undersigned, the
duly elected. qualified and Act
Ing Board Of Directors Of the
Debonairs Social and Art Club,
do hereby ass ociate ourselves for
the purpose Of forming a non
profit Club, and to that end do
adopt the following Articles Of
incorporation:


ART1cLEI


The name Of the Corporation
will be Debonairs Social and
Art Club, and the principal place
Of business will be in Phoenix,
Arizona.
ARTICLE OF INCORPORATION

Mrs. Amanda Gray l4l5 E.
Jefferson Phoenix, Arizona


Mrs. Ardella Galbreath = 1926
E. Adams Phoenix, Arizona
Mrs. Alvin Vera Richie 1889
W. Monroe Phoenix, Arizona
Mrs. Essie Mae Pullins l44l
S. 18th Ave. = Phoenix, Arizona

Adams Phoenix, Arizona

Restaurant, which opened recently in the African building

representing Allan Vaters director of the Tree House and
Ed Harding popular places Maite d. Harding also
a we'll known stage, and TV personality.

All Of the following named per-
sons, acting as incorporators
herein. we're duly elected Direc-
tors Of the Debonairs. Social and
Art Club. and are the elected,
qualified and acting Directors Of
said Corporation to wit, on June
"a, 1864, at Masonic Temple,
Fourth Street and Jefferson,
Phoenix, Arizona.
ARTICLE III

The purpose Of Corporation
shall be to work for Charity. The
Corporation shall have the power
to solicit funds and enter toCon-
tracts for the solicitation offunds
to be raised for the purpose Of
financing our charitable project
Of power for the maintenance Of
same. 1t shall have the power
to borrow money and to accept
gifts and requests, and own
establish and administer trusts
for the purpose Of the Corpora
ton and In accord with the laws
within the State Of Arizona. The
foregoing enumerated power and
Corporation shall IN addition
there to, have power to do all
things necessary, convenient,
incidental or advisable In con-
nection herewith.
ARTICLE I
ARTICLE II

The Debonairs may organize
as provided by laws. The

officers and the conditions Of
their election. suspension and

ARTICLE VII


All Of the following named
person acting as advisory
Board and does not consist Of
any members connected with the
Club we're duly elected az
Advisory Members Of the
Debonairs Social and Art Club,
and are duly elected. qualified
and acting Advisors Of the said
Corporation.


MIR. jim Titus


Mrs. Clarence Jackson
Mr.. George Barnes


Mr.. Virgil J. Berry


Mrs. Clarence r. Laing
Mr.. John Weber


Mr.. Ernest G. Burton
Mr.. Ted Cianas


Statutory Agent:


Mr.. J. D. Holmes, l4s9 East
Monroe, Phoenix. Arizona, who
has been a residence Of the
State Of Arizona for 8 years
is appointed Statutory Agent.
ARTICLES VIII


The private and individual pro-
perty Of the Members and Of
ficers Of this Corporation shall
not be liable for and be forever
exempt from all debts and liabili-
ties Of the Corporation.


Officers Of Incorporation:


Amanda Gray


Adella Calbreath


Alvin Vera Richie


Flora L. Ruffin


Essie Mae Pullins


Lille E. Belcher
Subscribed and sworn to before
me, Rose Anderson, a Notary
Public in and for the County Of
Maricopa, State Of Arizona, this,
the 9th day Of July 1864.


Rose Anderson


Notary Public
My Commission expires Dec,
is, 1865.

Mr.. J. D. Holmes, 1859 East


Monroe. Phoenix. Arizona, who
has been a residence Of the
State Of Arizona for 8 years


is appointed Statutory Agent.
Statutory Agent:

The affairs Of this Corporation
shall be conducted by the Board
Of Directors which shall not con-
sist Of less than five (5) or more
tan seven ~. The Board Of
Directors shall be elected at the
Annual Meeting Of the Debonairs
Social and Art Club. Such annual
meeting shall be held on the End
Sunday In January Of each year.
The members Of the Board Of
Directors shall classify them
selves by lot as to their respec-
tive terms Of office. Therefore,
at each annual meeting Of the
Debonairs Social and Art Club
be elected for the term expired.


Vacancies In the Board Of d.
rectors and Advisory Board &C.
curing before the expiration Of
any regular term Of office may
be filled and the successor to
such office appointed by the Club
to serve until the next annual
meeting Of the Debonairs Social
and Art Club.
ARTICLE V

My Commission expires Dec,
10, 1865.

Rose Anderson
Notary Public
